main.name: Amélie
main.description: After a first training in web development, I chose to continue my training thanks to a bachelor degree with Simplon Réunion, which I did in work-study program within the start-up Crowdaa. Motivated, creative and always curious to learn, I want to join a team to improve myself and continue to develop my skills.
main.bio: I'm a passionate junior web developer. I particularly like the React and nodeJS fullstack javascript combo. I'm passionate about animals, nature and perfumes.

resume.skillmessage: Here are my main skills as a junior developer :

education.description: Deepening of programming principles, decision-making in technical choices, mock-ups, group projects. Web Technologies :PHP, Javascript, NodeJs,  Python, SQLite, Mongo... Frameworks : Laravel(PHP), Electron (Desktop), Express (NodeJs), Tkinter (Python), Cordova (Mobile)...
Learning the basics of web and software development.Programming in C language, Java, MySQL, Android. Web technologies: HTML, CSS, PHP, Javascript

work.title: Fullstack developer
work.description: Development of features in Nodejs (backend) and React (frontend) following a microservices and serverless architecture (Serverless Framework, AWS Services, MongoDB database).

projects.title: Sad Corong
projects.category: Built with October CMS (PHP) for a personal assistance services association in Brittany

projects.title: Buggy Loc Run
projects.category: Built with WordPress & Woocommerce for a rental buggys agency in Reunion Island

projects.title: France Affutage
projects.category: Built with WordPress & Woocommerce for a sharpener craftsman in Normandy

projects.title: PizzaSon
projects.category: Built with WordPress & Woocommerce for a restaurant in Brittany

projects.title: Animal Airline
projects.category: (MVP Only-In progress) A React and Laravel personnal project to create a networking platform.

testimonials.text: Patient, curious to learn and efficient, Amélie quickly went from supporting the editorial team to being autonomous on certain projects, particularly on urban tourism products, mountain and major sites of the Loire Valley. With a good spirit of synthesis, Amélie knows how to get to the essentials while being rigorous and meticulous. Due to her daily good humor, Amélie was very appreciated in the team.
